item.title: Create Your Easy Customizable Internal Issue Tracker With Refine and Supabase
item.description: This web application will us to create issue and tasks for your team members. You will also be able to choose the priority of these tasks, their tags, and which person to assign them to.

item.title: Migrating a React-Admin Application to Refine
item.description: Recently, our team decided to migrate a B2B admin panel of one of our customers from React-Admin to refine to battle test our new framework and improve our productivity.
